CN.content:

Paragraph: 29 In the case of PQCDTB , the LUMO level ( -3.32 eV ) was higher than the PC71BM LUMO level ( -4.0 eV ) by 0.68 eV.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 29 In the case of PQCDTB , the LUMO level ( -3.32 eV ) was higher than the PC71BM LUMO level ( -4.0 eV ) by 0.68 eV.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| LUMO level of PQCDTB |
| Energy level (of PQCDTB LUMO) |
| Value (of PQCDTB LUMO energy level) |
| -3.32 eV |
| LUMO level of PC71BM |
| Energy level (of PC71BM LUMO) |
| Value (of PC71BM LUMO energy level) |
| Energy difference between PQCDTB and PC71BM LUMO levels |
| Value difference between PQCDTB and PC71BM LUMO energy levels |
| Difference |
| 0.68 eV

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Energy difference between PQCDTB LUMO and PC71BM LUMO levels |
| Value difference between PQCDTB LUMO energy level and PC71BM LUMO energy level |
| Difference |
| 0.68 eV |

Note: "LUMO level of PQCDTB", "Energy level (of PQCDTB LUMO)", and "Value (of PQCDTB LUMO energy level)" are redundant and can be removed as they are already included in "Energy difference between PQCDTB LUMO and PC71BM LUMO levels" and "Value difference between PQCDTB LUMO energy level and PC71BM LUMO energy level". Similarly, "LUMO level of PC71BM", "Energy level (of PC71BM LUMO)", and "Value (of PC71BM LUMO energy level)" can be removed.
